TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XpsImageType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies graphical formats for images that can be included in an .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this enumeration primarily as a parameter for methods that add images to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] documents.
## Examples The following example shows how to use this enumeration when you add images to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] document.
[!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#CreateAndWriteToXpsDocument](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/xpsreadwritesign/readingandwritingxps.vb#createandwritetoxpsdocument)] [!code-cs[XpsReadWriteSign#CreateAndWriteToXpsDocument](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/XpsReadWriteSign/ReadingAndWritingXps.cs#createandwritetoxpsdocument)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType JpegImageType = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType PngImageType = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType TiffImageType = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType WdpImageType = int32(3)
